sect1.title: Creating the reboot script
sect1.para: Create a new file /etc/init.d/reboot containing the following:

para.screen:
cat > reboot << "EOF" #!/bin/sh # Begin /etc/init.d/reboot
# # Call reboot. See man halt for the meaning of the parameters #
echo "System reboot in progress..."
/sbin/reboot -d -f -i
# End /etc/init.d/reboot EOF
